text.name: longdescription
text.text: The highest-selling single computer model (GWRs). CPU MOS Technology 6510/8500 @1.023MHz (NTSC) @0.985MHz (PAL), 64KB RAM + 20KB ROM, Graph VIC-II (320×200, 16 colors), Sound SID 6581/8580. Released Aug ’82. Note: Right Ctrl key changes joystick port, Select button enables On-Screen Keyboard.
